013package org.apache.juneau.annotation;
014
015import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.*;
016import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.*;
017
018import java.lang.annotation.*;
019
020/**
021 * Identifies a setter as a method for setting the name of a POJO as it's known by its parent object.
022 *
023 * <ul class='notes'>
024 *    <li>
025 *       The annotated field or method does not need to be public.
026 * </ul>
027 *
028 * <ul class='seealso'>
029 *    <li class='link'>{@doc juneau-marshall.Transforms.NamePropertyAnnotation}
030 * </ul>
031 */
032@Target({METHOD,FIELD})
033@Retention(RUNTIME)
034@Inherited
035public @interface NameProperty {}
